summary: Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.
cast: Aditya Roy Kapoor|Shraddha Kapoor|Shaad Randhawa|Salil Acharya|Parthaa Akerkar|Chitrak Bandyopadhyay|Bugs Bhargava|Ashish Bhatt|Gagan Gupta|Shubhangi Latkar|Soumyajit Majumdar|Nickk|Milind Pathak|Shekhar Shukla|Mahesh Thakur|Geet Vaghela
title: Aashiqui 2
